name: WorldBuilder (LozenStudio)
description:
Build, program and publish worlds made with this world builder.

the builder is not a GameEngine but can be used to make worlds and games with it using Javascript and loading with Html5.

The menu is not editable yet the whole game is.

How to play?

Hit the t key and type /help it will show the commands.

How to create a world?

Open the game.html file and under the <!--Plugins/Mods-->

import your world's plugins and mods into it using the script tag, here is an example:

<script src="Path/plugin.js"></script>

Games made with WorldBuilder
